description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Heal Cataract With Powerful Self Hypnosis' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  1. 1. What is Cataract?
  2. a. Cataract is the loss of transparency of the lens. The lens become cloudy or opaque thickens and has difficulty in focusing and admitting light.
  3. 2.Causes of Cataract: Cataract can arise from
  4. Congenital sources or as the result of trauma
  5. Heavy metal poisoning
  6. Diabetes
  7. Radiation exposure
  8. Steroids
  9. Age factor
  10. 3.How Self Hypnosis Can Help?
  11. Self hypnosis helps you release your past trauma
  12. Self hypnosis helps you to relax and calm down
  13. Self hypnosis helps maintain positive attitude
  14. Self hypnosis treats stress, anxiety, nervousness and depression successfully

It is for those who are suffering from cataract disease and are unable to get rid of the problems mentally and physically.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their cataract , general health and improve their mental health

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 8 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture 1: Introduction

Lecture 2: Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture 3: Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture 4: How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture 5: How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6: Guided Visualization Exercise: To Heal Cataract

Lecture 7: Summary

Lecture 8: Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity
